# CT DQ Check Package

The **CT-DataQualityCheck** package provides tools for performing data quality (DQ) checks on PySpark DataFrames. It includes two main functions, `flagging` and `quarantine`, which allow users to flag bad data and separate good and bad records based on custom DQ rules.

## Installation

To install the package, run the following command:

```bash
pip install CT-DataQualityCheck
